name: Mountain Motorbike Racing
description:
Perform extreme daredevil stunts to become the ultimate motorbike racing champion.
Mountain Motorbike Racing is perfect for motorbike riders who love heavy bike racing games!
Race against other racers, perform some serious stunts and reach the finish line really fast to win!

Mountain Motorbike Racing is an exciting bike racing and stunts game that will get your adrenaline pumping!
This fast paced, challenging game has many powerful bikes to choose from. Each level of Mountain Motorbike Racing is more thrilling than the previous one.  You can upgrade your bike to a more powerful one and use the NOS to drive super fast and leave the other racers behind!
The faster you drive the higher you score!

In Mountain Motorbike Racing you will feel like a real racer riding your motorbike on difficult off-road mountain paths. Perform insane tricks and enjoy the exhilarating action!

FEATURES of Mountain Motorbike Racing:
-- Many different bikes to choose from
-- Simulator like controls
-- Realistic motorbike racer physics
-- Smooth and realistic motorbike handling
-- Stunning 3D graphics
-- Dangerous off-road mountain environment
-- Many challenging levels
-- Realistic game sounds
-- Easy to learn and drive
-- Fresh attractive music

Come and play the most exciting motorbike racing game.  Mountain Motorbike Racing is easy to master yet challenging to play!

Get Mountain Motorbike Racing NOW and race to the finish line!
